title: aylabadia05
author: aylabadia05
content: Transfer Window 2022English Premier League | La Liga | Serie A | Bundesliga | Ligue 1(SUMMER)I tried to record the transfer list of some players who have officially joined and left several European clubs in the summer of 2022.This list is still lacking, because in every league not all clubs I have recorded the transfer process. If there is an error in the player transfer fee, please correct it because the source I used is transfermarkt.com1. comments.author: yudi09
comments.body: Nice initiative from you to do a record transfer window of football players. However, you do not write this transfer window in full.My advice, you must update every season the player transfer process for the following years is complete in every summer and winter transfer.
